overview:
Bob Zurek is SVP Products for Epsilon.

Prior to joining Epsilon, Bob was VP of Product Strategy at Endeca (sold to Oracle). Prior to Endeca, Bob was CTO and VP Product Mgt for Infobright. Bob has also served as CTO and VP Products at EnterpriseDB. Prior to EnterpriseDB, Bob has been director of product strategy in IBM’s Information Platform and Solutions Group, where he was responsible for driving and executing the technical strategy for information integration solutions as they relate to software, hardware, services, vertical industries, and emerging markets. Before that, Bob was vice president of product management and advanced technologies at Ascential Software (acquired by IBM) where he was instrumental in developing and driving Ascential’s enterprise data integration software strategy. Bob has also held executive positions with Powersoft and Sybase, and was vice president and chief technology officer of Incentive Systems. Bob has founded or co-founded several startups including Infinity Systems (sold to Powersoft), Lumapath, CohesionSG, MyCollegeFAQ and Azoppa. Bob received a BS from Keene State College.
